Uses of Package
de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

  • Packages that use de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server 
    Package Description
    de.ityx.mediatrix.api  
    de.ityx.mediatrix.api.factories  
    de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server  
  • Classes in de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server used by de.ityx.mediatrix.api 
    Class and Description
    ISAccount
    Provides the API to manage the accounts that are obligatory objects to catch mails from mail servers.
    ISAddress
    see ICAddress
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAddressAPI().store(con, rule);
    ISAnnotationPing
    see ICAnnotationPing
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAnnotationAPI().store(con, rule);
    ISAnswer
    see ICAnswer
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAnswerAPI().load(con, id, true);
    ISAppointment
    see ICAppointment
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAppointmentAPI().delete(id);
    ISAttachment
    see ICAttachment
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAttachmentAPI().load(con, id);
    ISAutoReply
    Provides functions to manage the auto replies.
    ISBlacklist
    see ICBlacklist
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getBlackListAPI().delete(con, id);
    ISBuzzword
    see ICBuzzword
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getBuzzwordAPI().store(con, buzzword);
    ISCall
    see ICCall
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getCallAPI().insertCall(con, call);
    ISCampaign
    see ICCampain
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getCampaigneAPI().createCampagne(rs);
    ISCase
    see ICCase
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getCaseAPI().store(con, case);
    ISCategory
    see ICCategory
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAPI().store(con, category);
    ISCommon
    The common interface contains basic functions e.g. for creating basic objects from the result set.
    ISContex
    see ICContex
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getContexAPI().storeMaster(con, daten);
    ISContexProcess
    English:
    see ICContexProcess
    ISCustomer
    see ICCustomer
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getCustomerAPI().load(con, id);
    ISCustomerContact
    English:
    manages the communication partners.
    ISDocument
    It's used to manage the documents(like attachments) of the text objects.
    ISEmail
    The base interface for the email objects.
    ISEmaillist
    Manages the email list objects.
    ISEmailReport 
    ISFAQEngine
    English:
    see ICFAQEngine
    ISFilter
    Contains the functions for the filter objects (Filters).
    ISFolder
    see ICFolder
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getFolderAPI().load(con, id);
    ISHTMLTemplate
    see ICHTMLTemplate
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getHTMLTemplateAPI().update(con, template);
    ISKeyword
    see ICKeyword
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getKeywordAPI().loadKeyword(con, id);
    ISLicence
    For the check of the license informations.
    ISLock
    Is used to manage the locks by the processing.
    ISLogin
    Used for the login process.
    ISMetaInformation
    English:
    used to manipulate the meta informations.
    ISNotice
    Organizes the notices.
    ISOperator
    see ICOperator
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getOperatorAPI().load(con, id);
    ISPassword
    It's possible to change the passwords.
    ISPing
    See ICPing
    ISProcessing
    Used for the operator mode.
    ISProfile
    see ICProfile
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getProfileAPI().getOperator(con, profile);
    ISProject
    see ICProject
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getProjectAPI().store(con, project);
    ISProjectArchive
    English:
    used by the external tool for the object archiving.
    ISPTMEEngine
    Provides functions to manage ptme module.
    ISQuestion
    see ICQuestion
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getQuestionAPI().store(con, question);
    ISReport
    see ICReport
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getReportAPI().generateCaseReport( con, data);
    ISRule
    see ICRule
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getRuleAPI().store(con, rule);
    ISScheduledReport
    To manage scheduled reports.
    ISScout
    English:
    useful functions for the scout module.
    ISSelfserviceAlias
    English:
    see ICWebSelfServiceAlias
    ISSelfserviceStopword
    English:
    see ICWebSelfServiceStopword
    ISSend
    English:
    describes the object to send mails (the default outgoing channel).
    ISServiceCenter
    see ICServiceCenter
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getServiceCenterAPI().store(con, servicecenter, true);
    ISSession 
    ISSingleMode
    Provides functions for the mail inbox SingleModeResult.
    ISSubproject
    see ICSubproject
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getSubprojectAPI().load(con, id);
    ISTask
    see ICTask
    ISTextObject
    Provides functions to manage text objects.
    ISWorkflow
    English:
    to manage the work flow process.
